ComicInfo.Summary:
Fury assigns Natasha to guard an agent with secret information but refuses to tell her anything else about the mission. After traveling all over Europe evading trouble, she's angry when she learns that it was Doctor Doom who was menacing the agent.
Hawkeye has to battle Iron Man's empty armor when the Mad Thinker takes control of it.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:35:54. [Issue ID 868014]
